00022     [System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItem(true)]
00023     public class Scanner : Gtk.DrawingArea
00024     {   
00025         public Scanner(){
00026             this.Destroyed += HandleDestroyed; 
00027         }
00028 
00029         void HandleDestroyed(object sender, EventArgs e){
00030             //Make sure we're closed
00031             if(this.worker != null){
00032                 //Don't call close, it'll force a redraw
00033                 this.worker.Abort();
00034                 this.worker.Join();
00035             }
00036             this.worker = null;
00037             
00038             //Release static image resources
00039             if(this.overlay != null)
00040                 this.overlay.Dispose();
00041             this.overlay = null;
00042             if(this.sourceMissing != null)
00043                 this.sourceMissing.Dispose();
00044             this.sourceMissing = null;
00045         }
00046         
00050         private string currentDevice = null;
00051         
00058         public void Open(string device){
00059             if(this.worker != null)
00060                 this.worker.Abort();
00061             this.worker = new Thread(this.ProcessVideo);
00062             this.currentDevice = device;
00063             this.worker.Start();
00064         }
00065         
00066         public void Close(){
00067             if(this.worker != null){
00068                 this.worker.Abort();
00069                 this.worker.Join();
00070                 lock(this.drawLock){
00071                     this.toDraw = null;
00072                     this.symbols = null;
00073                 }
00074                 this.QueueDraw();
00075             }
00076             this.worker = null;
00077             this.currentDevice = null;
00078         }
00079 
00083         private System.Threading.Thread worker = null;
00084         
00088         private System.Object drawLock = new System.Object();
00089         
00094         private byte[] toDraw = null;
00095         
00100         private int toDrawWidth;
00101         
00106         private int toDrawHeight;
00107         
00112         private List<Symbol> symbols = null;
00113         
00117         private void ProcessVideo(){
00118             using(Video video = new Video()){
00119                 try{
00120                     video.Open(this.currentDevice);
00121                     video.Enabled = true;
00122                     using(ImageScanner scanner = new ImageScanner()){
00123                         scanner.Cache = true;
00124                         this.CaptureVideo(video, scanner);
00125                     }
00126                     video.Enabled = false;
00127                 }
00128                 catch(ZBarException ex){
00129                     lock(this.drawLock){
00130                         this.toDraw = null;
00131                         this.symbols = null;
00132                     }
00133                     GLib.IdleHandler hdl = delegate(){
00134                         if(this.Stopped != null)
00135                             this.Stopped(this, new EventArgs());
00136                         if(this.Error != null)
00137                             this.Error(this, new ErrorEventArgs(ex.Message, ex));
00138                         this.QueueDraw();
00139                         return false;
00140                     };
00141                     GLib.Idle.Add(hdl);
00142                 }
00143             }
00144         }
00145         
00152         private void CaptureVideo(Video video, ImageScanner scanner){
00153             while(true){
00154                 using(ZBar.Image frame = video.NextFrame()){
00155                     using(ZBar.Image bwImg = frame.Convert(0x30303859)){
00156                         //Scan the image for bar codes
00157                         scanner.Scan(bwImg);
00158                         //Get the data, width, height and symboles for the image
00159                         byte[] data = bwImg.Data;
00160                         int w = (int)bwImg.Width;
00161                         int h = (int)bwImg.Height;
00162                         var symbols = new List<Symbol>(bwImg.Symbols);
00163                         //Flip the image vertically, if needed
00164                         if(this.Flip){
00165                             for(int ih = 0; ih < h; ih++){
00166                                 for(int iw = 0; iw < w / 2; iw++){
00167                                     //TODO: The offsets below could be computed more efficiently, but I don't care this happens on a thread... :)
00168                                     int p1 = w * ih + iw;
00169                                     int p2 = w * ih + (w - iw- 1);
00170                                     //Swap bytes:
00171                                     byte b1 = data[p1];
00172                                     data[p1] = data[p2];
00173                                     data[p2] = b1;
00174                                 }
00175                             }
00176                         }
00177                         //Lock the drawing process and pass it the data we aquired
00178                         lock(this.drawLock){
00179                             this.toDraw = data;
00180                             this.toDrawWidth = w;
00181                             this.toDrawHeight = h;
00182                             this.symbols = symbols;
00183                         }
00184                         this.ThreadSafeRedraw();
00185                     }
00186                 }
00187             }
00188         }
00189                 
00193         private void ThreadSafeRedraw(){
00194             GLib.IdleHandler hdl = delegate(){
00195                 this.QueueDraw();
00196                 return false;
00197             };
00198             GLib.Idle.Add(hdl);
00199         }

00215         public event EventHandler<BarScannedArgs> BarScanned;
00216 
00217         private string data = null;
00218         private const int overlayFrameCount = 35;
00219         private int overlayingFrames = 0;
00220         private Pixbuf overlay = Pixbuf.LoadFromResource("check.png");
00221         private Pixbuf sourceMissing = Pixbuf.LoadFromResource("webcam.png");
00222         
00227         public void ResetLastItemScanned(){
00228             this.data = "";
00229         }
00230         
00231         protected override bool OnExposeEvent(Gdk.EventExpose ev)
00232         {
00233             Gdk.Window win = ev.Window;
00234             Gdk.Rectangle rect = ev.Area;
00235             Gdk.GC gc = this.Style.BaseGC(StateType.Normal);
00236             lock(this.drawLock){
00237                 if(this.toDraw != null){
00238                     //Raise events for the symbols...
00239                     bool gotSymbol = false;
00240                     //See if there's a new symbol
00241                     if(this.symbols != null){
00242                         foreach(Symbol s in this.symbols){
00243                             if(s.Count > 0 && this.data != s.ToString()){
00244                                 this.data = s.ToString();
00245                                 //Don't raise it inside the expose event :)
00246                                 GLib.IdleHandler raiser = delegate(){
00247                                     if(this.BarScanned != null)
00248                                         this.BarScanned(this, new BarScannedArgs(s));
00249                                     return false;
00250                                 };
00251                                 GLib.Idle.Add(raiser);
00252                                 gotSymbol = true;
00253                             }
00254                         }
00255                     }
00256                     //Avoid beeping more than once..
00257                     if(gotSymbol){
00258                         if(!this.Mute)
00259                             System.Media.SystemSounds.Beep.Play();
00260                         if(this.overlayingFrames == 0){
00261                             GLib.TimeoutHandler hdl = delegate(){
00262                                 this.QueueDraw();
00263                                 this.overlayingFrames -= 1;
00264                                 return this.overlayingFrames > 0;
00265                             };
00266                             GLib.Timeout.Add(35, hdl);
00267                         }
00268                         //Start drawing an overlay
00269                         this.overlayingFrames = overlayFrameCount;
00270                     }
00271                     this.symbols = null; //Symbols have been handled
00272                     
00273                     //See if we want to request a resize
00274                     if(this.reqHeight != this.toDrawHeight ||
00275                        this.reqWidth != this.toDrawWidth){
00276                         this.reqHeight = this.toDrawHeight;
00277                         this.reqWidth = this.toDrawWidth;
00278                         this.QueueResize();
00279                     }
00280                     
00281                     //Draw the gray image
00282                     int w = Math.Min(rect.Width, this.toDrawWidth);
00283                     int h = Math.Min(rect.Height, this.toDrawHeight);
00284                     
00285                     //Draw the image
00286                     win.DrawGrayImage(gc, 0, 0, w, h, Gdk.RgbDither.Normal, this.toDraw, this.toDrawWidth);
00287                     
00288                     if(this.overlayingFrames > 0){
00289                         w = Math.Min(this.AllocatedWidth, (int)this.overlay.Width);
00290                         h = Math.Min(this.AllocatedHeight, (int)this.overlay.Height);
00291                         using(Gdk.Pixbuf pix = new Pixbuf(Colorspace.Rgb, true, 8, w, h)){
00292                             pix.Fill(0x00000000); //Fill with invisibility :)
00293                             this.overlay.Composite(pix, 0, 0, w, h, 0, 0, 1, 1, InterpType.Bilinear, 255 / 35 * this.overlayingFrames);
00294                             win.DrawPixbuf(gc, pix, 0, 0,
00295                                            (this.AllocatedWidth - w) / 2, 
00296                                            (this.AllocatedHeight - h) / 2, w, h, RgbDither.Normal, 0, 0);
00297                         }
00298                     }
00299                 }else{
00300                     win.DrawRectangle(gc, true, rect);
00301                     
00302                     int w = Math.Min(this.AllocatedWidth, (int)this.sourceMissing.Width);
00303                     int h = Math.Min(this.AllocatedHeight, (int)this.sourceMissing.Height);
00304                     
00305                     Rectangle img = new Rectangle((this.AllocatedWidth - w) / 2,
00306                                                   (this.AllocatedHeight - h) / 2,
00307                                                   w, h);
00308                     Rectangle target = Rectangle.Intersect(img, rect);
00309                     if(target != Rectangle.Zero){
00310                         win.DrawPixbuf(gc, this.sourceMissing, 
00311                                        Math.Max(target.X - img.X, 0), 
00312                                        Math.Max(target.Y - img.Y, 0), 
00313                                        target.X,
00314                                        target.Y,
00315                                        target.Width,
00316                                        target.Height,
00317                                        RgbDither.Normal, 0, 0);
00318                     }
00319                 }
00320             }
00321             return true;
00322         }
00323         
00324         protected override void OnSizeAllocated(Gdk.Rectangle allocation){
00325             base.OnSizeAllocated(allocation);
00326             this.AllocatedWidth = allocation.Width;
00327             this.AllocatedHeight = allocation.Height;
00328         }

00330         private int AllocatedWidth;
00331         private int AllocatedHeight;

00333         private int reqHeight = 200;
00334         private int reqWidth = 200;
00335         
00336         protected override void OnSizeRequested(ref Gtk.Requisition requisition){
00337             // Calculate desired size here.
00338             requisition.Height = this.reqHeight;
00339             requisition.Width = this.reqWidth;
00340         }

00376         public static IDictionary<string, string> ListVideoSources(){
00377             var retval = new Dictionary<string, string>();
00378             //Runtime platform check, see http://www.mono-project.com/FAQ:_Technical
00379             int p = (int) Environment.OSVersion.Platform;
00380             if((p == (int)PlatformID.Unix) || (p == (int)PlatformID.MacOSX) || (p == 128)) {
00381                 //Assume we're on Linux, if it's MacOS X we'll die because libzbar is missing
00382                 try{
00383                     //This can probably be done smarter, using HAL, however, AFAIK
00384                     //it is in the process of being replaced by DeviceKit so let's
00385                     //not start touching something that is unlikely to work...
00386 #if UDEV_RULES
00387                     try{
00388                         //A small hack that depends on Ubuntu's udev rules, to find a name
00389                         //See /lib/udev/rules.d/60-persistent-v4l.rules
00390                         foreach(var device in Directory.GetFiles("/dev/v4l/by-id/")){
00391                             var name = Path.GetFileName(device);
00392                             name = name.Remove(0, name.IndexOf("_") + 1);
00393                             name = name.Remove(name.IndexOf("-video-index"));
00394                             if(name == string.Empty)
00395                                 throw new Exception("Hack that jumps aways from here :) ");
00396                             retval.Add(name, device);
00397                         }
00398                     }
00399                     catch{
00400                         //rescue if the hack fails... :)
00401                         foreach(var device in Directory.GetFiles("/dev/", "video*")){
00402                             //I can at least add a space to make it look good :)
00403                             var name = "Video " + Path.GetFileName(device).Remove(0, 5);
00404                             retval.Add(name, device);
00405                         }
00406                     }
00407 #else
00408                     foreach(var device in Directory.GetFiles("/dev/", "video*")){
00409                         string name = null;
00410                         //Assume it supports capture
00411                         bool supports_capture = true;
00412                         
00413                         //Attempt to use /lib/udev/v4l_id a small program used in udev rules, but seems to be available to userspace
00414                         //v4l_id is afaik not documented, but it's short and the source can be found in extras/v4l_id/v4l_id.c
00415                         //of the udev development tree: linux/hotplug/udev.git
00416                         //See: http://git.kernel.org/?p=linux/hotplug/udev.git;a=blob;f=extras/v4l_id/v4l_id.c;hb=HEAD
00417                         try{
00418                             using(Process v4l_id = new Process()){
00419                                 v4l_id.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = false;
00420                                 v4l_id.StartInfo.FileName = "/lib/udev/v4l_id";
00421                                 v4l_id.StartInfo.CreateNoWindow = true;
00422                                 v4l_id.StartInfo.Arguments = device;
00423                                 v4l_id.StartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput = true;
00424                                 v4l_id.Start();
00425                                 string input;
00426                                 while((input = v4l_id.StandardOutput.ReadLine()) != null){
00427                                     if(input.StartsWith("ID_V4L_PRODUCT="))
00428                                         name = input.Remove(0, 15);
00429                                     if(input.StartsWith("ID_V4L_CAPABILITIES="))
00430                                         supports_capture = input.Contains(":capture:");
00431                                 }
00432                                 v4l_id.WaitForExit();
00433                                 if(v4l_id.ExitCode != 0)
00434                                     throw new Exception("Don't use anything we've got here...");
00435                             }
00436                         }
00437                         catch(Exception e){
00438                             //I can at least add a space to make it look good :)
00439                             name = "Video " + System.IO.Path.GetFileName(device).Remove(0, 5);
00440                         }
00441                         
00442                         if(supports_capture)
00443                             retval.Add(name, device);
00444                     }
00445 #endif
00446                 }
00447                 catch{
00448                     //Just ignore any exceptions and add the default video device,
00449                     //if case we're on a distro/os that doesn't use /dev/video*
00450                     //for video devices... udev rules maybe... The world is twisted place...
00451                     retval.Add("Default video device", "/dev/video0");
00452                 }
00453             }else{
00454                 //Windows
00455                 retval.Add("Default video device", "/dev/video0");
00456                 //Don't care how to find video devices on Windows(R),
00457                 //but /dev/video0 opens the default device... It is a undocumented
00458                 //feature of libzbar, see: zbar-0.10/zbar/video/v4w.c, line 442 - 445
00459             }
00460             return retval;
00461         }
00462     }
